Area Within Plan: Wahi i loko o ka Plan
Found Within Plan: Loaʻa i loko o ka Plan
IUCN activity - extraction: ʻO ka mining, ka ʻaila a me ka ʻili kinoea
IUCN activity - industrial fishing: Ka lawaiʻa ʻoihana, ka ʻiʻa iʻa
IUCN activity - restoration: Hoʻihoʻi hou / hoʻonui no nā kumu ʻē aʻe
IUCN activity - untreated water: Hoʻokuʻu wai i mālama ʻole ʻia
IUCN activity - works: Nā hana (nā awa, nā awa, ke kālai ʻana)
IUCN category 2 or 3: Pāka Lahui a i ʻole Natural Monument/Hiʻona
IUCN category 4 or 6: Wahi Hoʻokele Habitat/Species a i ʻole kahi i pale ʻia me ka hoʻohana mau
IUCN category 6: Wahi palekana me ka hoʻohana mau
IUCN rank - special 'variable' descripti: Hoʻololi; hilinaʻi inā hiki ke hoʻokele ʻia kēia haʻawina ma ke ʻano i kūpono me nā pahuhopu o ka MPA
IUCN rank - special no description: ʻAʻole maʻamau, he kuleana koʻikoʻi e kūʻē inā ʻaʻole pili nā kūlana kūikawā
IUCN rank - special yes description: ʻAe no ka mea ʻaʻohe mea ʻē aʻe, akā pono ka ʻae kūikawā
ReportError - message part 1: Ua hewa kekahi mea. E ʻoluʻolu e pani i kēia hōʻike a hoʻāʻo hou.
ReportError - message part 2: Inā mau ka hewa, e hōʻike mai.
ResultsCard - no result message: Ua pau ka holo ʻana o ka hōʻike, akā ʻaʻohe hopena i hoʻi mai
SizeCard - introduction: ʻO nā wai aupuni mai ke kahakai a hiki i 200 nautical mile, i kapa ʻia ʻo Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ). Hōʻuluʻulu kēia hōʻike i ka hoʻolālā o waho e pili ana me ka EEZ a me nā palena ʻē aʻe i loko, e ana ana i ka holomua i ka hoʻokō ʻana i ka % mau pahuhopu no kēlā me kēia palena.
SizeCard - learn more:
<0> Hōʻuluʻulu kēia hōʻike i ka nui a me ka hapa o kēia hoʻolālā i loko o kēia mau palena.

Inā hili nā palena MPA me kekahi i kekahi, hoʻokahi wale nō helu ʻana o ke kau ʻana.
Bathymetry Card - Learn more:
ℹ️ Nānā: Pono ka hohonu o ka moana no ka hoʻoholo ʻana i kahi e hānai ai, ola ai, a hānai ʻia nā iʻa a me nā mea ola ʻē aʻe. Pono nā papahana e noʻonoʻo i ka pale ʻana i nā ʻano hohonu o ka wai.

🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: ʻAʻohe

<2>🗺️ ʻIkepili Puna: <1>GEBCO

📈 Hōʻike: E helu ana i ka liʻiliʻi, awelika, a me ka hohonu hohonu o ka moana i loko o ka papahana.
Coral Card - learn more:
ℹ️ Nānā: ʻO ka hoʻihoʻi ʻana i ka ʻaʻa ʻaʻa ʻo ia ke kaʻina hana noʻonoʻo a me ka ikaika o ke kōkua ʻana i ka hoʻihoʻi hou ʻana a me ka hana hou ʻana o nā ʻāʻu koʻa i pōʻino a i hoʻohaʻahaʻa ʻia. Loaʻa ia i nā ʻano hana like ʻole a me nā hana e pili ana i ka hoʻoikaika ʻana i ka ulu a me ke ola ʻana o nā ʻano ʻākoʻa, hoʻomaikaʻi ʻana i ke ʻano o ke kai, a me ka hoʻihoʻi ʻana i ka hana kaiaola. Aia ka 7% o nā koʻakoʻa Belizean i kēia manawa i loko o nā HBPZ.

🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: 20% o nā ʻākoʻakoʻa ma HBPZs

🗺️ Ka ʻikepili kumu: uhi ʻaʻa no 2021 mai ka papahana Smart Coasts, loaʻa mai ka papahana GEOBON mai CZMAI.

📈 Hōʻike: ʻO ka pākēneka o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona i loko o kēia hoʻolālā e helu ʻia ma ka ʻimi ʻana i ka overlap o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona me ke kumumanaʻo, e hōʻuluʻulu i kona ʻāpana, a laila e puʻunaue ʻia me ka 'āpana o kēlā me kēia 'ano hi'ona i loa'a i loko o ka wahi ho'olālā kokoke i kahakai. Inā loaʻa i ka papahana nā wahi he nui i ʻāwili, e helu ʻia ka pāpaʻi hoʻokahi wale nō.
Coral Card 1: ʻO kēia kaʻina hana hoʻolālā ka pahuhopu e hāpai i ka ulu a me ke ola ʻana o nā ʻano ʻākoʻa. Hōʻike kēia hōʻike i ka holomua i ka pahuhopu o 20% o nā koʻa i mālama nui ʻia.
Exclusive Economic Zone\n(Territorial Se:
Wahi Waiwai Kūʻokoʻa
(Ka palena o ke Kai Teritori - 200nm i hala iho nei)
Geomorphology Card - learn more:
ℹ️ Manaʻo: Ua ʻike ʻia nā hiʻohiʻona o ke kai ma muli o ka geomorphology, e hoʻokaʻawale ana i nā hiʻohiʻona me ka hoʻohana ʻana i ka hohonu, ka pali o ke kai, a me nā ʻano kaiapuni ʻē aʻe.

Ma ka waihona o Seafloor Geomorphic Features, ua māhele ʻia ka papakū i nā papa (paʻu loa. ), nā pali, a me nā hohonu (hohonu loa). ʻO kēia mau hiʻohiʻonaʻekolu he mea kūʻokoʻa. Aia nā pāpū, nā ʻauwai, nā ʻili, nā pāpū, nā ala, a me nā ʻili i loko o kēia mau hiʻohiʻona ʻekolu.

🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: ʻAʻole i ʻike ʻia nā pahuhopu hoʻolālā no nā hiʻohiʻona geomorphic.

<3>🗺️ Source Data: Seafloor Geomorphic Palapala Hiʻona. <2>Harris, P.T., Macmillan-Lawler, M., Rupp, J. a me Baker, E.K. 2014. Geomorphology o ka moana. Marine Geology, 352: 4-24. <4>https://bluehabitats.org/

📈 Hōʻike: Ua helu ʻia ka pākēneka o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona i loko o kēia hoʻolālā e. e ʻimi ana i ka uhi ʻana o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona me ke kumumanaʻo, e hōʻuluʻulu i kona ʻāpana, a laila e puʻunaue me ka huina o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona i loaʻa i loko o ka wahi hoʻolālā kokoke i kahakai. Inā loaʻa i ka papahana nā wahi he nui i ʻāwili, e helu ʻia ka pāpaʻi hoʻokahi wale nō.
Geomorphology Card 1: He nui nā hiʻohiʻona geomorphological kino o ka papakū, hana kēlā me kēia i nā wahi e kākoʻo ai i nā kaiāulu kaiaola like ʻole. Pono nā hoʻolālā e hōʻoia i ka uhi ʻana o kēlā me kēia ʻano i lalo o ke kai. Hōʻuluʻulu kēia hōʻike i ka pākēneka o kēlā me kēia hiʻohiʻona geomorphological i loaʻa ma kēia hoʻolālā.
Habitat Card - learn more:
ℹ️ Nānā Manawa:

🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: ʻAʻohe pahuhopu hoʻolālā i ʻike ʻia no nā wahi noho.

🗺️ ʻIkepili Puna:

📈 Hōʻike: ʻO ka pākēneka o kēlā me kēia hiʻohiʻona. helu ʻia ke ʻano i loko o kēia kumumanaʻo ma ka ʻimi ʻana i ka uhi ʻana o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona me ke kumumanaʻo, e hōʻuluʻulu i kona ʻāpana, a laila puʻunaue ʻia me ka huina o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona i loaʻa i loko o ka wahi hoʻolālā kokoke i kahakai. Inā loaʻa i ka papahana nā wahi he nui i ʻāwili, e helu ʻia ka pāpaʻi hoʻokahi wale nō.
Habitat Card 1: ʻO ka pale ʻana i nā wahi noho koʻikoʻi ka mea nui i ka mālama ʻana i nā kaiāulu ʻano. Hōʻuluʻulu kēia hōʻike i ka pākēneka o kēlā me kēia wahi noho nui i loaʻa ma kēia hoʻolālā.
Human Stressors Card - learn more:
ℹ️ Nānā Manaʻo: Pono nā papahana e noʻonoʻo pehea e hoʻokele ʻia ai kēia mau wahi o ka hoʻohana ʻana o ke kanaka a me ke koʻikoʻi o ke kanaka ma ka hoʻolālā moana.

🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: ʻAʻohe pahuhopu hoʻolālā kikoʻī no nā wahi hoʻohana kanaka.

🗺️ ʻIkepili Kumu: 2020

📈 Hōʻike: Ua helu ʻia ka ʻāpana āpau o ka hoʻolālā, me ka nui o ka ʻāpana ma lalo o ka pale kiʻekiʻe a me ka nui o ka ʻāpana ma lalo o ka pale waena. Hoʻokahi wale nō helu ʻana o ka uhi ʻana, a inā e hili ʻia nā ʻāpana o nā pae pale ʻokoʻa, helu ʻia ka pae pale kiʻekiʻe loa.
Human Stressors Card 1: Hōʻuluʻulu kēia hōʻike i ka nui o nā ʻāpana hoʻohana kanaka e pili ana me kēia hoʻolālā. Pono nā hoʻolālā e noʻonoʻo i ka hopena hiki i nā ʻāpana ke kaupalena ʻia ke komo ʻana a i ʻole nā hana.
IUCN III. Natural Monument or Feature: IUCN III. Hoʻomanaʻo kūlohelohe a hiʻona paha
IUCN III. Natural Monument(s) or Feature: IUCN III. Nā Manaʻo Kūlohelohe a i ʻole nā hiʻohiʻona
IUCN Other Effective area-based Conserva: IUCN Nā Hana Hoʻomalu Ma muli o nā wahi kūpono (OECM)
IUCN V. Protected Landscape or Seascape: ʻO IUCN V. ʻĀina Palekana a i ʻole Ka Moana
IUCN V. Protected Landscape(s) or Seasca: IUCN V. ʻĀina Palekana (mau) a i ʻole (mau) Kai
IUCN VI. Protected Area with Sustainable: IUCN VI. Wahi Palekana me ka hoohana mau
IUCN VI. Protected Area(s) with Sustaina: IUCN VI. Wahi (mau) Palekana me ka hoohana mau
Littoral Forests Card - learn more:
ℹ️ Nānā Manawa: Ua ʻike ʻia ka nahele kahakai i ka hoʻohālikelike ʻana i ka ʻikepili mai ka makahiki 1980 a me 2019.

🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: Ua hoʻonui ʻia ka nui o ka nahele kahakai ma HPZ e 14.5% i ka makahiki 2025. Ua hoʻonui ʻia ka nui o ka nahele littoral ma HPZ i 60 % i ka makahiki 2030. Hoʻonui ʻia ka nui o ka nahele kahakai ma HPZ i 90% i ka makahiki 2035.

🗺️ Ka ʻikepili kumu: Littoral Forest data mai Cherrington & Griffin (2020).

📈 Hōʻike: The helu ʻia ka pākēneka o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona i loko o kēia kumumanaʻo ma ka ʻimi ʻana i ka overlap o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona me ke kumumanaʻo, e hōʻuluʻulu i kona ʻāpana, a laila puʻunaue ʻia me ka huina o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona i loaʻa i loko o ka wahi hoʻolālā kokoke i koho ʻia. Inā loaʻa i ka papahana nā wahi he nui i ʻāwili, e helu ʻia ka pāpaʻi hoʻokahi wale nō.
Littoral Forests Card 1: Hōʻuluʻulu kēia hōʻike i ka nui o nā ululāʻau kahakai i loko o kēia hoʻolālā, e ana ana i ka holomua i ka pahuhopu o 90% pale kiʻekiʻe o nā ululāʻau littoral ma 2035.
Mangrove and Littoral Forest: ʻO nā kumulāʻau mangrove a me ka nahele kahakai
Mangroves Card - learn more:
ℹ️ Overview: Nā ʻāpana kumu o nā mangrove i ʻike ʻia ma lalo o nā hoʻoponopono mangrove hou o 2018. Ua ʻike ʻia nā mangroves i ka hoʻohālikelike ʻana i nā ʻikepili mai 1980 a me 2019.

🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: 30% mālama ʻia nā mangroves a 4000 mau ʻeka i hoʻihoʻi ʻia e nā mangroves. .

🗺️ Ka ʻikepili kumu: Nā ʻāpana koʻikoʻi o nā mangrove mai nā hoʻoponopono mangrove o 2018. Nā ʻike mangrove a me nā mea i hoʻomaʻemaʻe ʻia mai Cherrington & Griffin (2020).

📈 Hōʻike: ʻO ka pākēneka o kēlā me kēia hiʻohiʻona helu ʻia ke ʻano i loko o kēia kumumanaʻo ma ka ʻimi ʻana i ka uhi ʻana o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona me ke kumumanaʻo, e hōʻuluʻulu i kona ʻāpana, a laila puʻunaue ʻia me ka huina o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona i loaʻa i loko o ka wahi hoʻolālā kokoke i kahakai. Inā loaʻa i ka papahana nā wahi he nui e kau ana, e helu ʻia ke kau ʻana i hoʻokahi wale nō.
Mangroves Card 1: Hōʻuluʻulu kēia hōʻike i ka nui o nā mangrove i loko o kēia hoʻolālā, e ana ana i ka holomua i ka pahuhopu 30x30 o 30% pale mangrove.
Ocean Space High Protection Objective: Pahuhopu Pale Kiʻekiʻe o Ocean Space
of littoral forests in High Protection Z: o na ululaau kahakai ma na Wahi Hoomalu Kiekie.
ʻo nā mangroves ma ka Moana Moana Belize.
of the Belize Ocean Space in High Protec: o ka Moana Moana Belize i loko o nā ʻāpana hoʻomalu olaola kiʻekiʻe
Priority mangrove areas and cleared mang: Ua ʻike ʻia nā wahi mangrove i hoʻomaʻemaʻe ʻia. Hōʻuluʻulu ka papa ma lalo nei i ka hili ʻana o kēia papahana me kēlā mau wahi.
Protection Card - Learn more:
ℹ️ Nānā: Ke hoʻohana nei kēia kaʻina hoʻolālā i ka IUCN framework o ka pae palekana:

IUCN Ia Koʻikoʻi koʻikoʻi koʻikoʻi no nā mea olaola like ʻole a me nā hiʻohiʻona geological/geomorphological, kahi e kipa ai ke kanaka, hoʻohana a me nā hopena. mālama ʻia a kaupalena ʻia e hōʻoia i ka pale ʻana i nā waiwai mālama

IUCN Ib Wilderness Area: ʻO ka maʻamau ka nui o nā wahi i hoʻololi ʻole ʻia a i hoʻololi ʻia paha, e mālama ana i ko lākou ʻano maoli a me ka mana, me ka ʻole o kahi noho kanaka mau a koʻikoʻi paha, palekana a mālama ʻia e mālama i ko lākou kūlana kūlohelohe

IUCN II National Park: Nā wahi kūlohelohe nui a kokoke paha i ke kūlohelohe e pale ana i nā kaʻina kaiaola nui me nā ʻano ʻano like ʻole a me nā ʻōnaehana kaiaola, a loaʻa pū kekahi i nā manawa uhane, ʻepekema, hoʻonaʻauao, ʻoliʻoli a me nā malihini kipa.

IUCN III He kia hoʻomanaʻo kūlohelohe a hiʻona paha: Nā wahi i hoʻokaʻawale ʻia no ka mālama ʻana i kekahi monument kūlohelohe, hiki ke lilo i ʻano ʻāina, mauna kai, ana moana, hiʻohiʻona honua e like me ke ana, a i ʻole kekahi hiʻohiʻona pving e like me ululāʻau kahiko

IUCN IV Wahi noho/mālama ʻano ʻano: Nā wahi e pale ai i nā ʻano a i ʻole nā wahi noho, kahi e hōʻike ai ka hoʻokele i kēia mea nui. Pono nā mea he nui i nā hana maʻamau e hoʻokō i nā pono o nā ʻano ʻano a i ʻole nā wahi noho, akā ʻaʻole kēia he koi o ka ʻāpana

IUCN V ʻĀina palekana a i ʻole kai moana: kahi i loaʻa ai ka pilina o nā kānaka a me ke ʻano o ka manawa. ua hoʻokumu i kahi ʻano ʻokoʻa me ka waiwai kaiaola, olaola, moʻomeheu a me nā hiʻohiʻona koʻikoʻi: a he mea nui ka mālama ʻana i ka pono o kēia pilina no ka pale a mālama ʻana i ka wahi a me kona mālama ʻana i ke ʻano a me nā waiwai ʻē aʻe

IUCN VI Nā wahi i pale ʻia me ka hoʻohana mau ʻana i nā kumuwaiwai kūlohelohe: Nā wahi e mālama ai i nā kaiaola, me nā waiwai moʻomeheu pili a me nā ʻōnaehana hoʻokele waiwai kūlohelohe. ʻO ka nui maʻamau, ma ke ʻano kūlohelohe, me ka hapa ma lalo o ka hoʻokele waiwai kūlohelohe hoʻomau a me kahi haʻahaʻa haʻahaʻa e hoʻohana ai i nā kumuwaiwai kūlohelohe ʻole i kūpono me ka mālama ʻana i ke ʻano i ʻike ʻia kekahi o nā pahuhopu nui

IUCN Other Effective Nā Ana Hoʻomalu e pili ana i nā wahi (OECM): He wahi i wehewehe ʻia ma kahi ʻē aʻe ma waho o kahi Wahi Palekana, i hoʻomalu ʻia a mālama ʻia ma nā ala e loaʻa ai nā hopena lōʻihi maikaʻi a hoʻomau no ka mālama ʻana i nā mea olaola, me nā hana a me nā lawelawe kaiaola pili. kahi kūpono, moʻomeheu, ʻuhane, socioeconomic, a me nā waiwai ʻē aʻe e pili ana i ka ʻāina (CBD, 2018).

Locally Managed Marine Areas (LMMA)

IUCN Ia, Ib, and II Manaʻo ʻia ʻo High Biodiversity Protection Zones (HBPZs). ʻO IUCN V, VI, OECM, a me LMMA ka manaʻo ʻia ʻo Medium Biodiversity Protection Zones (MBPZs). Ma kēia mau hōʻike, manaʻo ʻia nā pae IUCN III a me IV he MBPZ.

🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: ʻAʻohe

🗺️ ʻIkepili Puna: ʻAʻohe

📈 Hōʻike: Helu wale. helu o nā ʻāpana i kēlā me kēia pae palekana.
Seagrass Card - learn more: 🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: ʻAʻohe pahuhopu hoʻolālā kikoʻī no ka mauʻu. ʻāwili ʻia o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona me ke kumumanaʻo, e hōʻuluʻulu i kona ʻāpana, a laila e puʻunaue i ka huina o kēlā me kēia ʻano hiʻohiʻona i loaʻa i loko o ka wahi hoʻolālā kokoke i kahakai. Inā loaʻa i ka papahana nā wahi he nui i ʻāwili, e helu ʻia ka pāpaʻi hoʻokahi wale nō.
Seagrass Card 1: ʻO nā moena kai he ʻano kaiaola kai koʻikoʻi, e hāʻawi ana i ka meaʻai a me ka malu no nā mea ola moana he nui. Hōʻike kēia hōʻike i ka nui o nā ʻāpana kai i mālama ʻia e kēia hoʻolālā.
Show by Protection Level: Hōʻike ʻia e ka pae palekana
Size Card - Learn more:
ℹ️ Nānā: Aia ʻekolu mau ʻāpana moana i ka Moana Moana Belize:

(1) Kai loko: ʻO kēlā me kēia wahi o ka wai ma ka ʻaoʻao uka o ka palena o ke kai teritore.

< p>(2) Kai Teritori: Aia ia mau wahi o ke kai nona, ma ko lakou mau palena i loko, ke kaha kumu o ke kai teritore, a ma ko lakou mau palena mawaho, he laina i anaia mai ia kaha, o kela a me keia wahi he 12 mile nautika mai. ka lae kokoke loa o ia kaha.

(3) ʻAha Hoʻokele Waiwai Kūikawā (EEZ): Aia nā ʻāpana o ke kai ma ʻō aku a pili i ke kai teritore i loaʻa, ma ko lākou mau palena waho, he laina, i ana. mai kai mai ka palena o ke kai teritore, he 200 mile ka mamao o kela wahi keia wahi mai ka lae kokoke loa aku o ia kaha. Hoʻonohonoho ʻia kēia mau ʻāpana no nā wahi noho a me nā ʻano ʻano i kakaʻikahi, pilikia, kū hoʻokahi a i ʻole me nā pae hāiki. Aia i loko o kēia ʻāpana nā wahi hoʻohua a hānai ʻana paha, kahi noho ʻai nui, nā ʻano ʻano palupalu a koʻikoʻi paha a me nā wahi noho, a me nā wahi koʻikoʻi o ka honua. Ke hui pū ʻia, hāʻawi kēia mau ʻāpana i nā wahi noho a me nā ʻano me ka palekana no ka wā lōʻihi, a ua lawa ka nui e hōʻoia i ka hoʻololi ʻana o ka kaiaola a me ka hoʻololi ʻana i ke aniau. ʻAʻole kūpono kēia māhele ʻāpana no ka unuhi ʻana a i ʻole ka hoʻololi ʻana i ka moena moana a manaʻo ʻia he ʻāpana ʻole lawe ʻia ma ka ʻōlelo maʻamau. ʻO nā laʻana o ke kūlana palekana kiʻekiʻe, e pili ana i nā pahuhopu a me nā hana kanaka i ʻae ʻia, ʻo ia: ʻO nā wahi i pale ʻia i ka moana ma nā ʻāpana IUCN ʻo Ia, Ib, a me II.

Ke manaʻo ʻia nei ka mālama ʻana i nā mea olaola a me nā wahi hoʻohana hoʻomau e mālama i nā wahi. kūpono no nā pae haʻahaʻa o ka pale ʻana i nā mea olaola a kūpono pū me kekahi mau hoʻohana hoʻomau. Aia kēia mau ʻāpana i nā wahi noho a me nā ʻano ʻano i ʻae ʻia i ka haunaele a me nā hana kanaka. Aia pū kēia mau ʻāpana i nā wahi koʻikoʻi o ka ʻāina a me ka ʻāina. He kūpono kēia māhele ʻāpana no kekahi pae o ka unuhi ʻana a me ka hoʻololi ʻana i ka moena kai, me ka hoʻokele kūpono a me ke kuhikuhi ʻana, ma muli o ka pahuhopu o kēlā me kēia wahi i koho ʻia. Hiki i nā laʻana o ke kūlana palekana waena ke komo: Māhele IUCN Māhele V a me VI, Māhele IUCN OECM, a me Locally Managed Marine Areas (LMMA). Ma kēia mau hōʻike, manaʻo ʻia nā pae IUCN III a me IV he MBPZ.

🎯 Pahuhopu Hoʻolālā: 30% palekana o Belize Ocean Space. 15% pale i nā HPBZ. 15% palekana ma MPBZs.

🗺️ Source Data: Belize EEZ

📈 Hōʻike: Ua helu ʻia ka ʻāpana āpau o ka hoʻolālā, me ka nui o ka ʻāpana ma lalo o ka pale kiʻekiʻe a me ka ʻāpana āpau ma lalo. pale waena. Hoʻokahi wale nō helu ʻana o ka overlap, a inā e hili ʻia nā ʻāpana o nā pae pale like ʻole, helu ʻia ka pae pale kiʻekiʻe loa.
SizeCard - Intro: Aia i loko o ka Belize Ocean Space nā kai o loko, nā kai territorial, a me ka Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) a hiki i 200 nautical mile. Hōʻuluʻulu kēia hōʻike i ka uhi ʻana o kēia hoʻolālā me ka nui o ka moana, e ana ana i ka holomua i ka hoʻokō ʻana i ka pahuhopu o 30% palekana.
